channel.title: .Jar problem. Could not find main class
channel.description:
Ok i used a compiler to make my jar for my client. But it says error could not find main class. Is there a code i need to chage or add to my main.class file before i jar it. Or am i doing something wrong.
Any help is help thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 12, 2008, 09:04:00 PM[/size][hr]Not sure if i can bump. But I'm trying to get a web hosted client, and im pretty sure this is the first step. Any one wanna help me on that feel free =p. Anyways thanks for all help.
